0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 1600

Innate: Skarner's presence spawns  6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:
One beside  Baron Nashor's pit
One beside  Dragon's pit
One nearby each buff  monster's camp
0.html:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns 6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:

  • One beside Baron Nashor's pit
  • One beside Dragon's pit
  • One nearby each buff monster's camp
markedPassages: Baron Nashor's
Dragon's
monster's

1.text: After  minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by  champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
1.html: After minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
markedPassages: minions
champions

2.text: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants  sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. This also grants  30 split among its captors or  15 for a single captor.
2.html: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. This also grants 30 split among its captors or 15 for a single captor.
markedPassages: sight
30
15

3.text: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering  Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with  Impale.
3.html: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Impale.
markedPassages: Crystal Venom
Impale

4.text: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70 − 120 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, 43% − 160% (based on level)  bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
4.html: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70 − 120 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, 43% − 160% (based on level)  bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.

0.text: 70 − 120 (based on level)

1.text: 43% − 160% (based on level)

markedPassages: bonus movement speed
bonus attack speed
1% maximum mana

5.text: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.
5.html: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.

0.text: COST: 10 MANA
Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and becoming charged for 5 seconds if at least one has been hit. Subsequent casts while charged will deal bonus magic damage.
0.html: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and becoming charged for 5 seconds if at least one has been hit. Subsequent casts while charged will deal bonus magic damage.

1.content: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% of target's maximum health (+ 20% AD) (+ 30% AP)

1.text: Each instances of damage is capped at 200 damage against  monsters.Additionally, basic attacks  reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against  champions.
1.html:
Each instances of damage is capped at 200 damage against monsters.
Additionally, basic attacks  reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against champions.
markedPassages: monsters
reduce
champions

0.text: COST: 60 MANA
Active: Skarner gains a  shield for up to 6 seconds.
0.html: Active: Skarner gains a shield for up to 6 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: While the shield persists, Skarner gains  bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
1.html: While the shield persists, Skarner gains  bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

0.text: COST: 55 MANA
Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with  Impale, Fracture's cooldown is  reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
0.html: Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with Impale, Fracture's cooldown is  reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
markedPassages: Impale
reduced

1.text: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
1.html: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

2.text: Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark to deal bonus physical damage and  stun them for 1.25 seconds.
2.html: Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark to deal bonus physical damage and stun them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: stun

0.text: COST: 100 MANA

1.text: COOLDOWN: 120 / 100 / 80

0.text:
Active: Skarner  roots the target enemy  champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage and  suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.
Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
0.html:
Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.

Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
markedPassages: roots
champion
suppresses
revealed

1.text: Impale's drag ignores  displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast  Fracture, or use  Flash during Impale.
1.html: Impale's drag ignores displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast Fracture, or use Flash during Impale.
markedPassages: displacement immunity
Fracture
Flash
